text: “The Space Between Us” is an American romantic science fiction movie directed by Peter Chelsom and written by Allan Loeb. The story was developed by Stewart Schill, Richard Barton Lewis, and Allan Loeb. The film revolves around a teenage boy who was born on Mars. Curious about Earth, he embarks on a journey to our blue planet. == Cast == The movie features several notable actors: * Gary Oldman * Asa Butterfield * Britt Robertson * Carla Gugino * Logan Paul == Production == “The Space Between Us” was released on February 3, 2017, by STXfilms. Principal photography began on September 14, 2015, in Albuquerque, New Mexico. At the box office, it grossed $16 million against its $30 million budget. == References == == Other websites == * Category:American romance movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:Chinese movies Category:2017 science fiction movies Category:2017 romance movies Category:Movies directed by Peter Chelsom Category:Movies set in California Category:Movies set in Colorado Category:Movies set in Florida Category:Movies about adoption Category:Movies about orphans
title: The Space Between Us (movie)
